snippet: Stocks advanced after Europe’s central bank announced an array of stimulus measures, but investor enthusiasm faded.
abstract: Stocks end flat after day of swings.
lead_paragraph: Stocks advanced after Europe’s central bank announced an array of stimulus measures, but investor enthusiasm faded.

headline.main: Market Erases Early Gain After Mixed Bag of Earnings
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Has Slim Gain  After Day of Swings
